allow: Bash(PGPASSWORD=password123 psql -h localhost -p 5432 -U user -d criminal_case_db -c "SELECT DISTINCT bank_name FROM bank_accounts ORDER BY bank_name;")
Bash(PGPASSWORD=password123 psql -h localhost -p 5432 -U user -d criminal_case_db -c "SELECT id, case_number, case_id FROM criminal_cases WHERE case_number = ''11457/2568'';")
Bash(PGPASSWORD=password123 psql -h localhost -p 5432 -U user -d criminal_case_db -c "SELECT COUNT(*) as total_cases FROM criminal_cases;")
Bash(PGPASSWORD=password123 psql -h localhost -p 5432 -U user -d criminal_case_db -c "SELECT COUNT(*) as total_suspects FROM suspects;")
Bash(PGPASSWORD=password123 psql -h localhost -p 5432 -U user -d criminal_case_db -c "SELECT COUNT(*) as total_bank_accounts FROM bank_accounts;")
